name: zero gravity (itch) (o quindim)
description:
zero gravity

The idea of the game is a 2d platform game in which the character started at gravity 0 and had to eat or shoot "foods" to pass the level.

The management of this feature is up to the player (unfortunately in this version we could not implement the shooting system).

Evolution

Each level * has its specific challenges, such as:
- different gravity
- enemies
- puzzle

Development

This game was developed for LudumDare45 and would like to continue developing, your feedback will be very welcome to continue this journey.

* In this first version of the game you can only play 2 levels with little challenge.
